class mfm.models.tcspc.fret.GaussianModel(fit, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: mfm.models.tcspc.fret.FRETModel

This fit models is uses multiple Gaussian/normal distributions to fit the FRET-decay. Here the donor lifetime- spectrum as well as the distances may be fitted. In this models it is assumed that each donor-species is fitted by the same FRET-rate distribution.

References

Ra9876dfebd45-1

Kalinin, S., and Johansson, L.B., Energy Migration and Transfer Rates are Invariant to Modeling the Fluorescence Relaxation by Discrete and Continuous Distributions of Lifetimes. J. Phys. Chem. B, 108 (2004) 3092-3097.

append(self, mean: 'float', sigma: 'float', species_fraction: 'float')[source]¶

property amplitude¶
append(self, mean: 'float', sigma: 'float', x: 'float', shape: 'float' = 0.0)[source]¶

Adds/appends a new Gaussian/normal-distribution

Parameters

  • mean (float) – float Mean of the new normal distribution

  • sigma (float) – float Sigma/width of the normal distribution

  • x (float) – float Amplitude of the normal distribution

  • shape (float) – float Shape of the Gaussian (generalized Gaussian, log(x)…)

mfm.models.tcspc.tcspc module¶

Module contents¶

This module contains all time-resolved fluorescence models (TCSPC)
